00036 /* Creation flags */
00037 #define XNDREORD 0x00000001     /* Don't reorder pend queues upon prio change */
00038 
00039 /* Pod status flags */
00040 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00041 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00042 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00043 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00044 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00045 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00046 
00047 /* Sched status flags */
00048 #define XNKCOUT      0x80000000 /* Sched callout context */
00049 #define XNHTICK      0x40000000 /* Host tick pending  */
00050 #define XNSCHEDMASK  ~(XNKCOUT|XNHTICK)
00051 
00052 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00053 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00061 
00062 /* Flags for context checking */
00063 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00064 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00066 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00067 
00068 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00069 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00070 
00071 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICK         XNARCH_DEFAULT_TICK
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (128 * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00092 typedef struct xnsched {
00093 
00094     xnflags_t status;           
00096     xnthread_t *runthread;      
00098     xnarch_cpumask_t resched;   
00100     xnpqueue_t readyq;

00104     volatile unsigned inesting; 
00106 #ifdef CONFIG_RTAI_HW_FPU
00107     xnthread_t *fpuholder;      
00108 #endif /* CONFIG_RTAI_HW_FPU */

00110     xnthread_t rootcb;          
00112 } xnsched_t;
00113 
00114 #define xnsched_cpu(__sched__) \
00115     ((__sched__) - &nkpod->sched[0])
00116 
00117 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00118     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00119 
00120 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00121     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00122 
00123 #define xnsched_tst_resched(__sched__) \
00124     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00125 
00126 #define xnsched_set_resched(__sched__) \
00127     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00128 
00129 #define xnsched_clr_resched(__sched__) \
00130     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00131 
00132 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00133     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00230 static inline void xnpod_reset_watchdog (void)
00231 {
00232     nkpod->watchdog_trigger = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc() + nkpod->watchdog_reload;
00233     nkpod->watchdog_armed = 0;
00234 }

00241 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00242 {
00243     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00244     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00245 }
00246 
00247 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00248 {
00249     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00250         pod->minpri + incr :
00251         pod->minpri - incr;
00252 }
00253 
00254 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00255 {
00256     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00257         pod->maxpri - incr :
00258         pod->maxpri + incr;
00259 }
00260 
00261 static inline int xnpod_priocompare (int inprio, int outprio)
00262 {
00263     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00264        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00265     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00266     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00267 }
00268 
00269 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00270 
00271 {
00272     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00273     spl_t s;
00274 
00275     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00276     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00277     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00278     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00279     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00280 }

00282     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */

00284 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00285     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00286 
00287 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00288     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00289 
00290 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00291     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00292 
00293 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00294     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00295 
00296 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00297     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00298 
00299 #if defined(__GNUC__) && ( __GNUC__ > 2 || __GNUC__ == 2 && __GNUC_MINOR__ > 95 )
00300 static inline xnthread_t *xnpod_current_thread (void) __attribute__((pure));
00301 #endif

00303 static inline xnthread_t *xnpod_current_thread (void)
00304 
00305 {
00306     xnarch_declare_cpuid;
00307     xnthread_t *thread;
00308     spl_t s;
00309 
00310     xnarch_get_cpu(s);
00311     thread = xnpod_sched_slot(cpuid)->runthread;
00312     xnarch_put_cpu(s);
00313 
00314     return thread;
00315 }
00316 
00317 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00318     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00319 
00320 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00321     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00322 
00323 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00324     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00325 
00326 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00327     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00328 
00329 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00330     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00331 
00332 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00333     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00334 
00335 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00336     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00337 
00338 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00339     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00340 
00341 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00342     (xnpod_root_p())
00343 
00344 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00345 
00346 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00347     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00349 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void) {
00350     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00351 }
00352 
00353 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void) {
00354     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00355     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00356 }
00357 
00358 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks) {
00359     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00360     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00361 }
00362 
00363 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t) {
00364     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00365 }

00419 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void) {
00420 
00421     /* Don't swap these two lines... */
00422     xnarch_atomic_inc(&nkpod->schedlck);
00423     __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00424 }
00425 
00426 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void) {
00427 
00428     if (xnarch_atomic_dec_and_test(&nkpod->schedlck))
00429         {
00430         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00431         xnpod_schedule();
00432         }
00433 }

00463 static inline void xnpod_yield (void) {
00464     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00465     xnpod_schedule();
00466 }

00468 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout) {
00469     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00470 }
00471 
00472 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void) {
00473     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00474 }
00475 
00476 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void) {
00477     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
